title: Data Scientist
description:
Join our data science team to help build predictive models and derive 
        insights from large datasets. You'll work on cutting-edge ML projects that directly 
        impact business decisions.
requirements: Experience with machine learning frameworks (scikit-learn, TensorFlow)
Proficiency in statistical analysis and modeling
Knowledge of SQL and database systems
Master's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
preferred_skills: Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
Experience with A/B testing and experimental design
Experience with MLOps and model deployment
responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning models
Analyze large datasets to extract business insights
Collaborate with product and engineering teams
